info.title: Navigate to the first breadcrumb link in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeFirstBreadcrumbLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

commands.keystroke: Down Arrow, then Down Arrow, then Down Arrow

assertions.expectation: Role of the landmark region, 'navigation', is conveyed
Name of the landmark region, 'Breadcrumb', is conveyed
'Role of the breadcrumbs container, 'list', is conveyed
Number of list items, 4, is conveyed
